mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material.loan (material_id, count, borrower_id, loan_date, reviewer_id, expected_return_date) VALUES (#{materialId}, #{count}, #{borrowerId}, #{loanDate}, #{reviewerId}, #{expectedReturnDate})

INSERT INTO material.return (material_id, count, borrower_id, loan_date, expected_return_date, return_date, number_returned, number_damaged, loan_reviewer_id, return_reviewer_id, status) VALUES (#{materialId}, #{count}, #{borrowerId}, #{loanDate}, #{expectedReturnDate}, #{returnDate}, #{numberReturned}, #{numberDamaged}, #{loanReviewerId}, #{returnReviewerId}, #{status})
